title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: Gambling or betting is moving beyond just casinos and sports to other sectors of the economy. There is a thread here on betting for the 2024 United States election, and another one for the Oscars. I have seen people bet on movie characters and all sorts of things. This is not to say that they are addicted to gambling. I think we do it for fun, as a form of socializing. While thinking about it today, I wondered what the strangest bet I had ever had was. I remembered having a bet with my brother that he would give me $80 if I could eat 5 packs of 200g of instant noodles in less than 5 minutes, and if I couldn't, I would give him $90. What is the strangest bet you have ever had?

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: It seems I have some strange bets in my experience, maybe you don't think it's weird but I myself feel weird about the bets I make, one of which is I bet with my classmate that seven days from that day it will rain or not and the correct answer is will get $ 100 from each person who bets, Second, I bet on who can not sleep within 24 hours and everyone who is lose must pay $ 135 to the winner, at that time there were 5 people who took part in the bet, I think that is the strangest bet I made and it is beyond the ordinary people's minds to place a bet.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: After remembering that I had one bet that I thought was weird and that I did with my own friend. In short, my friend and I are betting to get 1 woman, or competing to date the same 1 woman. Yes, at that time my friend and I made a bet on who could get it first, then the first date, all costs were borne by the loser. Maybe many people experience this kind of experience, but for me personally this kind of thing seems quite taboo and I consider it a strange bet that I make.Honestly I'm sorry, my regret is because I feel it played on the woman's feelings.

comments.body: this question made me remember the time when I was really addicted to gambling until I made a bet with 3 of my friends about the sound of the lizard sounding how many times. and that's not all I also once bet with my friend about whether it is raining or not today and if I am right I will get $ 20 if I lose I will give $ 20 to my friend.this is a ridiculous bet that I have ever felt in the past. well, even if it's just for fun, but for me it's really fun to bet with my friends about bets that never exist in casinos.

comments.body: When i was young i made a stupid bet with a girl. She told me that if i can keep a 20€ in my fist and she can open it just by talking she could get the 20, if i managed to keep my fist closed she would give me 20. So that was a no brainer, i won't just open my hand and get free 20. And i guess i was drunk because immediately she told me that this won't count, i need to have my thumb outside the fist, and i opened my fist to take it out and she took the 20.I felt like a moron so i guess i deserved it.

comments.author: Zackgeno96
comments.body: I can't speak for myself but I can speak for a few people I've read/heard stories about. There are people who have put money on the European championship in 2004, that Greece would win it. Greece was then seen as one of the weakest teams in the European Championship, but in the end they won the tournament. Someone sold his house and bet everything on Greece winning. He probably bought the whole street with his money afterwards. But that was a success story, there are also people who have experienced the downside with betting on odds of 1.01 who went completely wrong and placed a bet of $100,000 or more. That's how it can go.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: I've been with those type of bets when I was younger, yeah, a kid that do gambles with his friends about nonsense stuff and I think that's quite normal. Like if who's gonna win with your friend's sparring. I've got crazy experiences about it and I just realized that it was strange since the adults that has been with us have tolerated everything and it was a different norm way back then when we were younger. But now, as an adult, I wouldn't teach kids to gamble for physical fights even if it's for fun since kids shouldn't hurt each other whether it's made with prizes or giveaways.
